forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Morning high of 13C with temps falling to 6 to 8. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low 4C. SSW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low around 40F. SSW winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High around 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 45F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low 46F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.
